amendment.description: An amendment numbered 49 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to prohibit the use of funds from being made available to pay the salary and expenses of Antony Blinken.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
